summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; ;amending Seattle Municipal Code 18.12.030A, -.040, -.050, -.070, -.080, -.120, -.170, -.180, -.240, -.260, -.270, and -.280 of and adding new sections to the Park Code to extend the Superintendent's permit-issuing and rule-making authority, add or modify requirements and prohibitions regarding use or activities in certain areas, and make other changes in such code; amending 12A.52.020 of the Criminal Code to clarify the Superintendent's enforcement responsibilities; repealing Seattle Municipal Code 18.12.220; and imposing penalties.
